models.game

类 Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • models.game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    The Class Player. after a player was created , actions of assign and remove all the countries, all the cards, all the armies to the player is possible to do.
    版本:
    2.0
    作者:
    Bingyang Yu ,Parisa khazaei

      • attack

        public int[] attack(int[] attackerDice,
                    int[] defenderDice)
        this is the attack method. it compares the value of dice and return the number of looser army for players
        参数:
        attackerDice - the number of attacker dice
        defenderDice - the number of defender dice
        返回:
        it returns an array with value of number of looser army for both players
